page.title: 08A MUM'S MONDAY IN LIVERPOOL
page.content: MY NAME IS BRENDA.I AM MARRIED WITH TWO CHILDREN.MY HUSBAND IS { {UNEMPLOYED.}WE ALL GET UP ABOUT 7:00 AND HAVE OUR BREAKFAST.THE CHILDREN LEAVE FOR SCHOOL AT 8:30.MY HUSBAND AND I GIVE OUR PLACE A QUICK TIDY BEFORE WALKING TO THE SIGNING ON OFFICE,WHERE HE COLLECTS HIS {UNEMPLOYMENT}MONEY.I THEN GO TO THE LIBRARY.FROM THERE IT'S BACK TO OUR MAISONNETTE FOR LUNCH.THEN IT'S CLEANING AND WASHING,THIS TAKING MOST OF THE AFTERNOON AND DONE TO BACKGROUND MUSIC FROM RADIO MERSEYSIDE.EITHER MY HUSBAND OR I PREPARE THE EVENING MEAL,THE CHILDREN ARRIVING HOME AT 4:30.AFTER THE MEAL WE SETTLE DOWN FOR SOME T.V.OR A READ.IF THE WEATHER IS FINE I TAKE THE DOG FOR A WALK.SUPPER IS USUALLY ABOUT 9:00.AFTER THE CHILDREN'S BEDTIME WE SETTLE DOWN TO WATH T.V.UNTIL MIDNIGHT
